text: Gu ntigem kha buni vhɨzɨ zav, gu khaŋ nzuai. Nde za wari tɨgɨp ndɨkndɨk ndava bavira kɨv, za kha gumgir korar muuŋri. Nde guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, nde guigira wari won ndavir wari wo phorge regi ntɨɨri ga ndɨɨi tɨvara, nde wari won ndavir mben nɨɨŋv, guigira mben korar muuŋv, rɨɨrɨɨi tɨvi thari.
